channel.title: Need help with funpk thing
channel.description: Hey I got a question, how can i make it so when people are at funpk arena that the level difference thing that is on my server doesnt apply. I think it would be something like [code]if coords = x=3534w.e the coords are y=w.e the corods are and then the void statement = false[/code] or somehting like that im not that good at coding. someone help me out with this?

item.title: Need help with funpk thing
item.dc:creator: @coolpup2233 coolpup2233
item.description:
@coolpup2233 wrote:

Im sorry let me rephrase this i need the method for FunPk because i know that i just need to add that code to my move deeper into wilderness code but i need the void or w.e you call it to match up with it. Anyone help me?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 11, 2009, 03:29:10 am[/size][hr]Sorry for double post but i really want this fixed i think this will help. there is already other ones put in there like fight pits. Here is the public boolean i guess for it.

public boolean IsInFightCave() { return absX >= 2360 && absX <= 2445 && absY >= 5045 && absY <= 5125; }

i dont understand the absx and all that stuff explain please? I know someone knows so please help a guy out.

Read full topic
